original: Larsson, Jonas Hugo, lektor, Linköping, f. 5/11/87 i Hycklinge, Östergötl. 1., av Lars-Gustaf L. o, Christina Gustafsson. G. 15 m. Britta P :son Reuterwall, Barn: Siv f, 16, Ulf 25. — Mog:ex, i Linköp. 06, fil. mag. i Upps. 09, fil, lic, 14, fil, dr 17, provår i Upps, 15. Vik. adj. i Hudiksvall 10, lektor där 18, vik. rektor 20 o. rektor 20-37, extralär. v. Linköp, h, a, 1, 10- II, vik, adj, där 16 o, rektor 37-40, e. o, lektor i Södertälje 16-19, vik, rektor där 19, lektor i eng. o. tyska v. Linköp, folksk:sem. sed. 39. Tf, un-dervisn:råd under ett flertal per. 29-37. Var i Hudiksvall bl. a. insp, f. elem:sk. f. fl., ordf, i folksk:styr. o. 559dess undervisn :nd, led. av stadsfullm., kyrkofullm., styr. f. sparbanken. Kas-saförv. i Link:s Stiftsbibi. vänner 41, insp. f. koiTLm. mellansk. i Finspång 42, ordf. i Ped. Sällsk. i Link. 41, suppl. i länsnykterh :nd i östergötl. 1. 43. Stud .-resor t. Tyskl. 13, 15, 16, 31 o. 32, Engl. 14, Frankr. 21 o. 22. Skr.: Lautstand der Mundart der Gemeinde Altengaminic (grad:avh. 17) m. m. RNO.
translated: Larsson, Jonas Hugo, lecturer, Linköping, b. 5/11/87 in Hycklinge, Östergötland, 1st child of Lars-Gustaf L. and Christina Gustafsson. Married on 15th to Britta P :son Reuterwall, Children: Siv b. 16, Ulf b. 25. — Former spouse, in Linköping in 06, BA in Uppsala in 09, MA in 14, PhD in 17, probationary period in Uppsala in 15. Acting assistant teacher in Hudiksvall in 10, lecturer there in 18, acting principal in 20 and principal from 20-37, temporary teacher at Linköping high school from 1/10 to 1/11, acting assistant in Linköping from 16 and principal from 37-40, substitute lecturer in Södertälje from 16-19, acting principal there in 19, lecturer in English and German at Linköping elementary school from 39. Acting education board member during several periods from 29-37. Was, among other things, inspector of elementary schools in Hudiksvall, chairman of the elementary school board and the education committee, member of the city council, church council, and the board of the savings bank. Cashier for the Friends of Linköping Diocesan Library in 41, inspector for the intermediate school in Finspång in 42, chairman of the Pedagogical Society in Linköping in 41, substitute in the county sobriety board of Östergötland in 43. Study trips to Germany in 13, 15, 16, 31, and 32, to England in 14, and to France in 21 and 22. Writings: Lautstand der Mundart der Gemeinde Altengaminic (doctoral dissertation in 17) etc. Knight of the Order of the North Star (RNO).

structured.name: Jonas Hugo Larsson
